phrases: He worked hard to stay that way.
It is unlikely that anyone around him would deny that.
With his grades at school, his character and personality...
Being perfect had become part of his very being...
After our first date ended in failure...
We made up for it by going on a lot of dates.
Due to various circumstances, we had not been able to be alone since we started going out...
That way, it is a bit of a walk.
It was fun being with Arima.
Since we had led lives of total hard work and self control until then...
Were not you glaring at me just now?
I see the epitome of beauty in him.
He is prettier than most girls...
Everything he does he does right,
and he hangs out with me,
and he is nice to me...
Now that we have got more time together...
I do not know anything besides Afternoon tea.
But I still do not understand Arima.
I wonder what is inside that polished she will of his.
what does he feel, what is in his heart...?
That is what I want to know.
I want to watch him forever.
I wonder what he is thinking.
Will I be able to know one day?
After our first date ended in failure...
We made up for it by going on a lot of dates.
Even though it was unavoidable, I still regret it.
That we were not really able to be alone together since we started going out...
So you could say we felt it was now or never.
We may be a bit early.
Then why do not we go this way for a bit?
It was fun being with Miyazawa.
Since we had led lives of total hard work and self control until then...
Were not you glaring at me just now?
I bet she is caught up in some mysterious train of thought again.
I do not think I will ever figure out her thought patterns as long as I live.
Sure, I like her, and I think she is cute...
But I have really gone and fallen for a weird person.
her disposition's rotten to the core...
she is scary when she gets mad...
It is also interesting how she seriously agonizes on
and off about how weird she is.
Now that we have got more time together,
I never get bored gazing at her unique world.
It is ok, I like tea.
I bet Miyazawa does not know that I have got a complex towards her.
It is not fair that our grades are the same
and yet she is the one with all the individuality.
I feel like I am the most constricted, nondescript person in the world.
I guess the only value I really have is just being smart after all.
I thought I would be able to
be happy if I were perfect...
You are getting more tanned every day.
Are you trying to pick up girls on the beach this time?
The ocean is a paradise for men!
You went on a date with Arima yesterday, right?
Miyazawa, could not you respond a bit more like a girl your age?
We went to the Shinagawa Aquarium...
During summer vacation we are going to
Edo River or Sumida River to see the fireworks.
We are going to Disneyland, too.
You are getting more tanned every day.
I am studying, so it is okay.
She gets to go on a date with Arima!
I want to go on one, too!
It is not that fun being with me.
Three months have passed since I met Miyazawa.
The first month was a one-sided love...
I should have been able to change, being with Miyazawa.
But I have not really changed much, after all.
Reason always comes before my emotions.
so occasionally I get emotional, but...
I always end up sealing those emotions away.
and I can never open it.
It felt like only you keep changing...
to keep up with you anymore.
I have got student council business today, so I cannot walk home with you.
Let us walk home together tomorrow, okay?
I will wait for you, even if you will be late.
Hey, Sis, how far have you gone with your boyfriend?
It is all too early for high school students!
Daddy, you are behind the times.
With high school students these days, anything goes.
Do not tell our daughters such things *When I was young, necking was the most we did!*
*When I was young, necking was the most we did!*
The world's overflowing with the pleasures and sorrows of the couples mass-produced from the Athletics Festival, and yet...
Maybe it is just because Yuki's out of sync with the world.
It is better if nothing's going on...
It would have been so entertaining
if she could cause a family discussion.
Dear, could you pass me the soy sauce?
It is just like Kano said.
The freshness guarantee only runs one month...
Nothing lasts more than one summer.
I guess there has to be a parting.
Ahh, where in the world is true love?
You are certainly a bargain-full of cheap love.
Where in the world is Arima?
Is Miyazawa really having fun being with me?
Am I actually a good enough guy for her?
I am supposed to walk home with you today.
Yeah, but I am sorry for being late.
This is the first time I have seen you sleeping.
You look so neat, even when you are asleep.
And Kano has these sad dreams sometimes and sobs in her sleep.
Let us wait around a bit.
School feels so nice after everyone is gone home.
Most people would say it is creepy.
Did you wait for me to wake up?
You should have just woken me.
But you were sleeping so soundly.
You are so busy with committees and practice and all.
We do not see that much of each other,
so I just wanted to be with you.
Miyazawa, you are like a little puppy.
I have always been an older sister, and I have been putting on appearances by myself for so long...
But I do not think I want anyone besides you to take care of me.
I want to be with you...
I want to be with you...
I want to be with you...
I want to be with you...
Sorry, I will go cool my head off.
Why do I have this song running through my head at a critical time like this?!
It will not stop ringing in my ears!
The song will not get out of my head!
What the hell have I done?!
I just remembered what I was going to say back then.
I was saying I did not want anyone besides you to take care of me.
You can let me take care of you, too.
I was thinking that all those years up through middle school...
But maybe that is not true.
has given me the strength to support you.
Then those years will be redeemed.
You do not have to tough it out.
It gets tiring to stand by yourself.
You want someone who will support you.
Suddenly memory goes back to the past.
She strove to be perfect, for vanity, for glory, to be the best.
for the family who scorned him.
I hear you came in first during finals again!
You have always been number one.
There is no one who can beat you.
Sis, there is something really neat on TV.
I want to finish this study guide, so I will pass.
Is it that much fun to come in 1st place?
I hear you came in first during finals again!
You have always been number one.
There is no one who can beat you.
Are you going out with someone?
There had been nothing that stirred my heart.
I will become a decent person.
I will become a decent person my father and mother can be proud of.
As long as my parents are happy, I am happy.
Both of their worlds changed greatly upon entering high school.
Miyazawa holds the key to unlock the door to my heart.
You are a real stallion, are not you?
Maybe I should use a UV treatment.
Was not that lightning last night really loud?
You going on another date this Sunday?
I hope it will be sunny.
It will be just fine, rain or shine.
But, hey, was not that lightning Last night really loud?
You going on another date this Sunday?
I hope it will be sunny.
It will be just fine, rain or shine.
It will be just fine, rain or shine.
We have got a lot ahead of us.
Sis gets in the habit of going on a LOT of dates and is in a state of perfect happiness once again.
But a deep, yawning gulf was awaiting them!
There are pitfalls everywhere in life!
